akn:section.akn:heading: Establishment of risk and audit committees

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general To assist the Board to fulfill its duties and responsibilities under section 9621(a) of this title, the Corporation shall establish a risk committee and an audit committee.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Duties and responsibilities of risk committee

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Duties and responsibilities of risk committee Subject to the direction of the Board, the risk committee established under subsection (a) shall have oversight responsibility of—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Duties and responsibilities of audit committee

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Duties and responsibilities of audit committee Subject to the direction of the Board, the audit committee established under subsection (a) shall have the oversight responsibility of—
